pullRequest.title: spacewalk-cert-tools: Added RHEL8 build and simplified SPEC file.
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR change?
Added RHEL8 build support.
Minor simplification of the SPEC file.
GUI diff
No difference.

 DONE

Documentation


No documentation needed: No functional change.


 DONE


Test coverage

No tests: Tested during automated build.

Tested the build successfully on CentOS 8, Fedora 31+, LEAP 15.2

 DONE

commit.message: spacewalk-cert-tools: Added RHEL8 build and simplified SPEC file.

nodes.bodyText:
Seems we have no this BuildRequires 2 times.
In Line 89 you added BuildRequires:  (python or python2) and here we have it again with using macros.
Or should be be just a Requires ?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -84,13 +86,16 @@ Spacewalk.
 %package -n python2-%{name}
 Summary:        Spacewalk SSL Key/Cert Tool
 Group:          Applications/Internet
+BuildRequires:  (python or python2)
 Requires:       %{name} = %{version}-%{release}
 Requires:       python2-rhn-client-tools
 Requires:       python2-uyuni-common-libs
-%if 0%{?rhel} && 0%{?rhel} <= 5
-Requires:       python-hashlib
-%endif
+%if 0%{?suse_version} || 0%{?rhel}
+BuildRequires:  python2
